text: Sir Anthony Joseph Francis O'Reilly (7 May 1936 - 18 May 2024) was an Irish billionaire. He was born in Dublin, Ireland. He was the chairman of Dublin's Independent News & Media Group and was once the CEO of the H.J. Heinz Company. O'Reilly played rugby for the Leicester Tigers and London Irish in England. He played for Ireland between 1955 and 1963. O'Reilly died at a hospital in Dublin on 18 May 2024, after a short illness at the age of 88. ==Related pages== * List of billionaires ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Irish businesspeople
title: Tony O'Reilly
